data.name: Blobbs: Mad Science
data.detailed_description:
Enter the labratory of the brilliant but entirely mad Dr Otto von Blobbenstein and assist him and his wacky assistants in their research across 50 brand new levels in this totally mad level pack.

  • Join the search for a whole new species of blobb, experiment with Blackholes and even investigate the mysteries of Ghost Blobbs.
  • Discover the new Gadget Bots, which add puzzling new gameplay mechanics, in brand new experimental levels created just for this DLC.
  • Battle against 4 new boss blobbs with each with unique and interesting mechanics as you help keep the lab running (relatively) safely.
  • The Mad Science Level Pack also includes 8 additional in-game (and Steam) achievements to unlock.

data.short_description: Enter the labratory of the brilliant but entirely mad Dr Otto von Blobbstein and assist his wacky research across 50 brand new levels in this totally mad level pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (NVIDIA and AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
